sentences.en: A bronze chariot ridden by chameleons radiating flaring lights.
sentences.cn: 一辆被燃烧的蜥蜴覆盖的青铜战车.

sentences.en: A vulgar flaring paper adorned the walls.
sentences.cn: 墙壁上装饰着廉价的花纸.

sentences.en: Consider the bell bottoms of the 1970's with their tight waists and wide flaring bottoms.
sentences.cn: 想想20世纪70年代的窄腰大喇叭底的喇叭裤.

sentences.en: Goebbels was flaring up at me.
sentences.cn: 戈塔尔当时已对我面呈愠色.

sentences.en: His eyes darkened and the crowded flaring streets become blurred to his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛变得暗淡了,拥挤的闪耀着灯光的街道在他眼前变得模糊了.

sentences.en: I turned to Jacky, my nostrils flaring in disgust.
sentences.cn: 我转过身厌恶地看着杰基，鼻翼呼呼地翕动着。

sentences.en: I went straight to a hot peak , flaring up in instant anger.
sentences.cn: 我火冒三丈, 愤怒直接爆发.

sentences.en: Mind that gun. It's flaring back.
sentences.cn: 当心那门炮, 它有炮尾焰.

sentences.en: Tempers where flaring up after the game.
sentences.cn: 比赛过后,满腔怒气爆发了.

sentences.en: The flaring skirt was fitted at the hips, ankle - length and hand of ruffles , some - times pleated flounces.
sentences.cn: 臀部合体的喇叭裙长及踝骨, 并有数层荷叶边或折叠花边.

sentences.en: The game introduce: Does flickering flaring gold coin someone like?
sentences.cn: 游戏介绍: 闪闪发光的金币有人不喜欢 吗 ?

sentences.en: The lamps were already flaring in the dark, and a cool wind was blowing.
sentences.cn: 路灯已在暮色中发光, 吹来了一阵冷风.

sentences.en: There was flaring of the nares.
They were stars, I knew, and flaring comets, that peopled my flight among the suns.
sentences.cn: 我知道是这些星辰和闪烁的慧星遍布在我飞行恒星之间的航程中.

sentences.en: This detachment was all the more remarkable midst the flaring emotions of 1940.
sentences.cn: 在1940年人们情绪极端激昂之时,这种超然的态度就更加值得注意了.

words.tran_cn: 闪光，闪耀；耀斑；爆发；照明弹
闪耀，闪光；燃烧；突然发怒
使闪耀；使张开；用发光信号发出；使外倾
燃烧的；发光的；引人注目的

phrases.tran_cn: 突然发怒；突然燃烧，骤然
镜头光晕；透镜光晕；镜头光斑；眩光

trans.tran_cn: 火焰摇曳的，闪耀的，张开的，喇叭形的
（使）闪耀( flare的现在分词 )，（使）（船舷）外倾，（使）鼻孔张大，（使）（衣裙、酒杯等）呈喇叭形展开
